name: Autumn!
description: '''Benjamin Clarence Phillips Jr.''' (formerly '''TrapGodBenji''') (born June 24, 1997), known professionally as '''Autumn''' (stylized as '''Autumn!'''), is an American rapper and record producer. He is best known for popularizing the [[hip hop]] microgenre [[Plugg (music)|pluggnb]], alongside [[Victor Victor Worldwide]] labelmate [[Summrs]], and Texas rapper [[Kankan (rapper)|Kankan]].
